means: 使受痛苦，折磨( afflict的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Violent crime is only one of the maladies afflicting modern society.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴力犯罪仅仅是困扰现代社会的严重问题之一。

sentence.Network_en: Violent crime is only one of the maladies afflicting modern society.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴力犯罪仅仅是危害社会的弊病之一.

sentence.Network_en: I had heard nothing of the troubles afflicting that place.
sentence.Network_cn: 我当时从未听说有关困扰当地的麻烦.

list.abs: We should help people in affliction ., 我们应该帮助在苦难之中的人们.
此外,还有第三种意识——烦恼识(afflicted consciousness),又称为“末那识”或思量识、作意识、相续识、分别识。烦恼识没有明性,经常都处于充满“我”的念头及.
For You save an afflicted people , But haughty eyes You abase ., 困苦的百姓 , 你必拯救 ． 高傲的眼目 , 你必使他降卑.
dream_nimin131_wordpress_blog ... 逭逭/ escape from/ 患处患处/ afflicted part/ 幻灯幻灯/ lantern slides/.

entry.def: If you are afflicted by pain, illness, or disaster, it affects you badly and makes you suffer.

example.ex: Italy has been afflicted by political corruption for decades...
example.tran: 几十年来意大利一直饱受政治腐败之苦。

example.ex: There are two main problems which afflict people with hearing impairments...
example.tran: 听力有障碍的人们主要受到两大问题的困扰。

auth_sentence.content: The result is a set of buildings that resisted the plagues constantly afflicting Haiti.
auth_sentence.res_content: The result is a set of buildings that resisted the plagues constantly afflicting Haiti.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The result is a set of buildings that resisted the plagues constantly afflicting Haiti.

auth_sentence.content: He said he could not get heat into the front tyres - a problem that has been afflicting him on and off for several races.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said he could not get heat into the front tyres - a problem that has been afflicting him on and off for several races.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said he could not get heat into the front tyres - a problem that has been afflicting him on and off for several races.
